Sana Musasama bụ ónyé Africa-America na-emepụta ụrọ na ónyé na-ese ihe na mgbasa ozi na New York City

Ọrụ nka ya na ọrụ ya yiri ọrụ ya dị ka ónyé nkụzi na ntinye aka na ihe ndị ruuru mmadụ karịsịa ịzụ ahịa ụmụ nwanyị. A matala ọrụ ya na ọtụtụ onyinye gụnyere Anonymous Was a Woman Award na 2002, Joan Mitchell Painters and Sculptors Grant na 2013, ọ bụkwa ụlọ ngosi ihe mgbè ochie na Harlem Artist-in-Residence na 1983 Xi84
Musasama bụ osote prọfesọ na Hunter College.
A mụrụ Musasama na Saint Albans, New York.
O nwèrè BA na Ceramics na Education site na City College (1974) na MFA site na Alfred State College of Ceramics (1987)

Ọ gara n'ihu na ọmụmụ ihe ya na Archie Bray Foundation na Helena, Montana; Gakium Designer College na Tokyo, Japan; Tuscarora International School of Ceramics na Tuscarora, Nevada; na Mende Pottery na Mendeland, Sierra Leone.

Ọrụ nka na ọrụ Musasama dị ka onye nkụzi sitere na njem ya dị ukwuu na Africa, Eshia, na Latin America gụnyere mba ndị dị ka Sierra Leone, Cambodia, Vietnam, na Japan iji mụta banyéré ọdịbendị ndị na-abụghị nke ọdịda anyanwụ, ọkachasị dịka ọ metụtara ụmụ nwanyị na nsogbu mmekọrịta na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na-emetụta ụmụ nwanyị. N'afọ ndị 1970 ọ gara West Africa ebe ọ biri ma rụọ ọrụ na Mendeland, Sierra Leone, ọ bụ ebe ahụ ka ọ hụrụ mmetụta nke ibi úgwù ụmụ agbọghọ

Ahụmahụ a mere ka o nwee mmasị n'ihe gbásárá ụmụ nwanyị ndị ọzọ gụnyere: ijide ụkwụ, ịgba ụtụ isi ọkụ, ndina n'ike na ịgba akwụna. Ruo ihe karịrị afọ 20, Musasama emeela nchọpụta banyéré nsogbụ ndị a ma mepụta ihe osise na nzaghachi.
